CustomField.description: The reason the Licence is being set to Not Activated
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The reason the Licence is being set to Not Activated. This will be copied to the Not Activated Reason field on the Licence if the PICR is approved.
CustomField.label: Not Activated Reason

value.fullName: Franchisor - Australia Post declined to proceed
